com.javax0.jdsl.executors.Factory

    Package Description
    com.javax0.jdsl

    • Uses of Factory in com.javax0.jdsl

      Methods in com.javax0.jdsl with parameters of type Factory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Analyzer GrammarDefinition.list(Factory<ListExecutor> listExecutorFactory, Analyzer... analyzers)
      Create a ListAnalyzer that uses the executor listExecutor and contains the analyzers in a list.
      Analyzer GrammarDefinition.many(Factory<ListExecutor> listExecutorFactory, Analyzer analyzer)
      Same as GrammarDefinition.manyOptional(Factory, Analyzer) but the min value is one instead of zero.
      Analyzer GrammarDefinition.many(Factory<ListExecutor> listExecutorFactory, Analyzer analyzer, int min, int max)
      Creates a sequence analyzer that uses the analyzer to at least min and at most max times.
      Analyzer GrammarDefinition.manyOptional(Factory<ListExecutor> listExecutorFactory, Analyzer analyzer)
      Creates a sequence analyzer that analyzes zero or more times.
      Analyzer GrammarDefinition.optional(Factory<ListExecutor> listExecutorFactory, Analyzer... analyzers) 
      Analyzer GrammarDefinition.optional(Factory<ListExecutor> listExecutorFactory, Analyzer analyzer)
      Creates a SequenceAnalyzer with zero min value and one max value.
